snippet.title: Vesperal Times Short Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
keyrif.itch.io/vesperaltimes

Who thought that the space will be a mysterious place? 

Among many planets that The Empire controls, there is one that everyone is afraid of it. Every spaceship that was near it crashed, this can no longer continue.

The Galactic Empire sent a specialized squad to investigate the issue, the statistics show that this planet is indeed populated by medieval life.

So far there is no explanation for these crashes...
